name: Discounted Curation Service
description: Our special curation service for building your dream space. The perfect balance between working with a designer and the flexibility to try out designs on your own.
content1: 1 on 1 time via email with your appointed designer
content2: 2 draft idea for your selected number of rooms
content3: Final design with shopping & access to exclusive discounts with our furniture retailer partners

name: Classic Curation Service
description: Our classic curation service for building your dream space. The perfect balance between working with a designer and the flexibility to try out designs on your own.
content1: 1 on 1 time via email with your rising star designer
content2: 2 draft ideas for your selected number of rooms
content3: Final design with shopping & access to exclusive discounts with our furniture retailer partners

description: Our special curation service for building your dream space. The perfect balance between working with a designer and the flexibility to try out designs on your own.

name: Premium Curation Service
description: Our premium furniture curation service to fill your space with pieces you absolutely love. Collaborate with an expert designer to bring the room(s) of your dreams to life.
content1: 1 on 1 time via email with your expert designer
content2: 2 draft ideas for your selected number of rooms
content3: Final design with shopping & access to exclusive discounts with our furniture retailer partners
content4: Custom floor plan for each room

name: Custom Design Service
description: Get the VIP treatment and end-to-end support for your design project. The complete interior design experience - virtual. Whether you need help choosing flooring, counters, wallpapers, or a custom built-in furniture design, this is the service for you.
content2: 1 on 1 time via phone, email, or messaging with your expert designer.
content3: Final design with shopping & access to discounts with our furniture retailer partners

name: Luxe Custom Design Service
description: Get the VIP treatment and end-to-end support for your design project. The complete interior design experience - virtual. Whether you need help choosing flooring, counters, wallpapers, or a custom built-in furniture design, this is the service for you.
